QuetZalCoatl::

QuetZalcoatl heard all conversation and said "That fixed some of my 
troubles"said Cheerfully the male "IF you two are agree to do in this 
place a neutral zone, then I'll stay her to be sure tha no body will 
touch  the ark until time comes... So you can leave this place, I' 
have a lot things to do, and I don't need a fight here"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup gets the comm message from Rattrap.
> 
> Kup(via comm): I am leading a team at the Ark.
> 
> Kup closes the link, and listens to Maxima.
> 
> Kup: I remember you very well from the great wars, Maxima. I know 
why you are really doing this. It's Megatron. However, for some 
reason, I believe and trust you.
> 
> He looks to his troops.
> 
> Kup: Maximals stand down.
> 
> He looks back at the Decepticon femme.
> 
> Kup: I'll leave the Ark in your care, but we'll be watching 
carefully.
> 
> 
> EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima's crimson optics glowed & narrowed. She had to pick this 
battle carefully.
> 
> "Remove yourselves from the area!" she demanded. "I'm willing to 
talk to Rodimus Prime to .. settle this arrangement!" 
> 
> Her optics went to Kup. "I'll speak with you, Kup! ONLY if the 
others back off! I don't want this place destroyed as much as you!" 
> 
> With this she made her way, leaping, down to the ground then 
waltzing up towards Kup. Her optics caught sight of Convoy as well. 
This intregued her.. she hadn't seen this one before. Then her 
crimson optics glared at Empath. Empath was making another wrong 
impression with her. 
> 
> She then turned her optics on Kup as she stepped up to him. "I 
don't wish to do anything with the inhabitants inside. I'm merely 
protecting them." Pausing. "Even though as much as I loathe your 
Autobot companions in stasis, my intentions are true & pure. I only 
want those inside to remain untouched.. & unharmed." Another 
pause. "I'll be willing to give my life for them. I'm placing my very 
existance on the line here, Kup. If Rodimus still sees a problem with 
that, then he can come to face me."
> 
> "As to the others here, I believe that the Ark should have no 
inhabitants, but I will regularly return here. I have the Ark & 
Teletran 1 wired to notify me of intruders as well as Defenses armed 
& ready when anyone other than I are nearby. Hence, why you were 
fired upon. If you don't like that... then... the Ark can suffer in 
the future." Her voice so serious. However, she was SO bound & 
determined to have this her way. There was one reason as to why. & he 
was inside the Ark. 
> 
> Her crimson optics gazed at Kup, awaiting his response.
